originalText.text: Excellent service for our students going home for the holidays. Coach Bus Rental NY is the only shuttle bus rental service we've used in years, and we aren’t planning on changing that. They provide the best communication of all charter companies we’ve ever worked with, clear and concise at all times. We strongly recommend this company for all your group trips!

text.text: Excellent service for our students going home for the holidays. Coach Bus Rental NY is the only shuttle bus rental service we've used in years, and we aren’t planning on changing that. They provide the best communication of all charter companies we’ve ever worked with, clear and concise at all times. We strongly recommend this company for all your group trips!

originalText.text: The booking process was excellent. Coach Bus Rental NY's chartered bus arrived on schedule and was in excellent condition. Our trip exceeded our expectations and deserved all five golden stars. We were very pleased with the entire experience and would highly recommend them to others.

text.text: The booking process was excellent. Coach Bus Rental NY's chartered bus arrived on schedule and was in excellent condition. Our trip exceeded our expectations and deserved all five golden stars. We were very pleased with the entire experience and would highly recommend them to others.

originalText.text: During our trip, Coach Bus Rental NY provided excellent service and accommodations. We booked with their representative a few days before the trip, and they were quick and dependable. The bus arrived on schedule for all parts of the journey, so I definitely recommend it.

text.text: During our trip, Coach Bus Rental NY provided excellent service and accommodations. We booked with their representative a few days before the trip, and they were quick and dependable. The bus arrived on schedule for all parts of the journey, so I definitely recommend it.

originalText.text: This company deserves more than 5 starts! We took a senior citizen trip around town and the driver engaged the seniors and told them stories. It was a hit. Thank you.

text.text: This company deserves more than 5 starts! We took a senior citizen trip around town and the driver engaged the seniors and told them stories. It was a hit. Thank you.

originalText.text: One of the things that stood out to me about this company is that their buses were clean, and the driver was friendly. It really made a difference.

text.text: One of the things that stood out to me about this company is that their buses were clean, and the driver was friendly. It really made a difference.
